long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Tooltip Info is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension that provides detailed image properties when you hover over any image on a webpage. With this tool, you can easily view an image's resolution, file size (in KB or MB), and the ALT text (if available), without needing to open the image or inspect the element.

Key Features:
Hover Over Images: Instantly get image details when hovering over images on any webpage.
Resolution Display: View the image resolution (width x height).
File Size in KB/MB: Know the exact file size of the image, displayed in either KB or MB based on the size.
ALT Text: Displays the imageâ€™s ALT text for accessibility or SEO purposes.
No Popups: Enjoy a clean, non-intrusive user experience with tooltips appearing directly next to the image.
Works on All Websites: The extension works seamlessly on all websites that display images, including blog posts, e-commerce sites, galleries, etc.

How It Works:
Once installed, simply hover over any image on a webpage, and the extension will display a small tooltip in the top-right corner of the image, showing its properties, including:

Image Resolution (Width x Height)
Image File Size (KB or MB)
Image ALT Text (if provided)
This extension is lightweight, fast, and user-friendly, making it the perfect tool for designers, developers, and anyone interested in quickly gathering image properties while browsing the web.

Why Use It:
For Developers: Quickly check image sizes and resolutions for optimization purposes.
For Designers: Get a fast overview of the images used on a website to assess quality and performance.
For Content Creators: View ALT text of images and ensure they are SEO-friendly.
For Web Enthusiasts: Curious about the details of images on the web? This extension gives you all the information you need instantly.

Privacy Practices:
No Data Collection: This extension does not collect or store any user data. It only works locally on the browser and displays image information in the tooltip.
Permissions: The extension only requires the activeTab permission, which allows it to work with the images on the active tab. No other permissions are required.
